description: Retrieves the protect configurations that match any of filters. If a filter isn't provided then all protect configurations are returned.

parameters.name: ProtectConfigurationIds
parameters.description: An array of protect configuration identifiers to search for. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: An array of ProtectConfigurationFilter objects to filter the results. (dict) --- The filter definition for filtering protect configurations that meet a specified criteria. The name of the attribute to filter on. An array of values to filter for. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the attribute to filter on.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: An array of values to filter for.

nested_items.name: ProtectConfigurations
nested_items.description: An array of ProtectConfigurationInformation objects that contain the details for the request.

nested_items.name: ProtectConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the protect configuration.

nested_items.name: ProtectConfigurationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the protect configuration.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the protect configuration was created, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: AccountDefault
nested_items.description: This is true if the protect configuration is set as your account default protect configuration.

nested_items.name: DeletionProtectionEnabled
nested_items.description: The status of deletion protection for the protect configuration. When set to true deletion protection is enabled. By default this is set to false.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to be used for the next set of paginated results. You don't need to supply a value for this field in the initial request.
